2006年12月27日 - 基因突变(gene mutation)是遗传病和肿瘤发生的根本原因,检测与遗传病及恶性肿瘤发生有关的突变基因(mutant gene)是分子生物学,医学遗传学及肿瘤学.
突变型生长缓慢, 形成的菌落很小, 所以称小菌落突变体(petite mutant)。 后来发现该突变体缺少细胞色素 a, b 和细胞色素c氧化酶, 是线立体基因全部丢失(突变).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Latin mutant- 'changing', from the verb mutare

entry.def: A mutant is an animal or plant that is physically different from others of the same species because of a change in its genes.

means.word_mean: 1. (biology) an organism that has characteristics resulting from chromosomal alteration
2. an animal that has undergone mutation
1. tending to undergo or resulting from mutation;
